content: ch1-space 3 times 3dc into next ch1- ch1 doesn t count as a st 3sc into next ch1- space 11 times slip_stitch to 3rd chain to join 108 space 2sc into next ch1-space 42 times slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join 210 round 10 ch4 counts as first double_crochet and chain sk1 double_crochet ch1 round 17 sk1 47 times slip_stitch to 3rd chain to join 108 note remember to crochet this round very 54 eyelets loosely a flatter result is more likely to be achieved by going up 1 or 2 crochet hook round 11 sizes slip_stitch to next ch1-space ch1 doesen t count as a st crab st into every ch3 and 2dc into same ch1-space 2dc into next other st cut the yarn fasten_off 105 ch1-space 2 times 3dc into next ch1-space 2dc into next ch1-space 2 times 17 times slip_stitch to 3rd finishing chain to join 126 sew all yarn ends in the placemats shown in the pattern are only steam blocked to finish off original design by heidi heinrichs © 2020 all rights reserved 2
